note.p: Birth: At or near Bodmin, Cornwall, England (c 1715 - )
Eduction: Career: Freemason, member, 1767, Lodge of Friendship No 4, subsequently No 6 London
References: The Library and Museum of Freemasonry 'Freemasons and the Royal Society;Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' 2010, page 26
Notes: Ejected 7 April 1791 for non-payment of contributions (Journal Book).
